name: Falling Tiles - Unity Game Jam: Create with Code
name_original: Falling Tiles - Unity Game Jam: Create with Code
description:
Falling Tiles is a dynamic game where you have to find the secret item behind the cells to pass rounds by shooting at them.

There is no other objective than pass rounds and rounds.
Watch out! Time is running out and the floor is not always so stable. Tiles can push you out, too...

If you like it please rate it! and follow me in: marinellifranco.wordpress.com
